page.title: 19Wytham: modern problems.
page.content: Problems in Wytham village are discussed at parish meetings. Reports on topics such as the improvements to the village hall,the addition of swings to the recreation ground, the activities of the Parents' Association the claims on the Hope ffenell Trust, new planning applications and the dumping of rubbish are all overshadowed by the discussion of traffic problems. Consideration of the safety of the children being bussed to school has resulted in the use of a mini bus and taxis,morning and evening The decision of the Department of Transport to make changes on the A34 Trunk Road has lead to discussion and alternative proposals from the people. Parking on the dangerous corners of the road,and the use of the village so as to avoid the congestion at the Peartree roundabout calls for action.
